data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Open firmware password protection is turned off by default, but provides password protection on MAC computers that have MAC OS X version 10.1 or later operating system installed. This ____ only ____ a ____ to ____ started ____ the ____ that ____ user ____ the ____ password ____ as ____ startup ____. For the firmware password to work securely, there must be strong effort by the user to create a safe and strong password as a physical security measure (apple, 2010).
data.partBlankContent: Open firmware password protection is turned off by default, but provides password protection on MAC computers that have MAC OS X version 10.1 or later operating system installed. This soft____ only all___ a comp____ to b_ started fr__ the vol___ that t__ user wi__ the cor____ password desig_____ as t__ startup vol___. For the firmware password to work securely, there must be strong effort by the user to create a safe and strong password as a physical security measure (apple, 2010).
data.fullContent: Open firmware password protection is turned off by default, but provides password protection on MAC computers that have MAC OS X version 10.1 or later operating system installed. This software only allows a computer to be started from the volume that the user with the correct password designates as the startup volume. For the firmware password to work securely, there must be strong effort by the user to create a safe and strong password as a physical security measure (apple, 2010).
data.answer: Open firmware password protection在默认情况下是关闭的，但在安装了MAC OS X version 10.1或更高版本操作系统的MAC计算机上提供密码保护。本软件只允许用户以正确密码指定的启动卷作为计算机的启动卷。要让固件密码安全工作，用户必须努力创建一个安全而强大的密码作为物理安全措施(苹果，2010)。
